1. Press "NUMBER" on the main screen and enter the number. Spaces are OK.

 2. Long press the right arrow to type message.

 3. Long press the right arrow to confirm and send.

1. Press "MESSAGE" on the main screen.

 2. After typing message, long press right arrow to send to a contact.

 NOTE: When sending to non-contacts start from "NUMBER".

1. Press "CONTACTS" on the main screen.

 2. Choose a Contact and begin typing message.

 3. Long press the right arrow to confirm and send message.

A service runs in the background that will keep track of incoming sms messages. You can choose to refresh or clear the remote device's messages by pressing the "REFRESH MESSAGES" and "CLEAR MESSAGES" button's at any time.

 When a new sms is received , An "InBox" item will appear in the main list.

 You can reply to messages in the same manner as newly created ones.

This app uses your Android\'s Default SMS Delivery mechanism to send SMS messages. If you believe for any reason that this app fails to deliver messages, please verify that you can send a message using the android device directly, using the exact same number that failed using this app.
